instructions: # Moldvay Character Sheet This sheet has both a Player sheet and a pared down Monster Sheet for the GM that is switchable via a tab at the top left of the sheet.## Player Sheet* All of the automatic roll buttons (shown as a d20 dice) should have roll templates.* Attack rolls now show the AC hit (they use the values from the To Hit Roll table) - No more looking up what AC you did hit!* All ability bonus' should be included in their automatic rolls.* Halflings should check the box marking 'Halfling' under Attacks, Missile in order to get the bonus' to Missile Attacks and Initiative* Movement must be calculated by the player using their current encumbrance and armor worn.## Monster Sheet* Monster Name and Type* Armor Class and Movement* Treasure Type and Alignment* Hit Die (a gmroll button is in the works for this field)* Number Appearing (a roll button is in the works for this field, possibly a roll template and maybe a choice between gmroll or not gmroll* Monster Save (roll templates are in the works for this)* Monster Morale (roll template is in the work for this* Attacks are a repeating field and you can add as many as you want - Roll Template attack button is included :)* Monster Notes - Add anything you like here.* Monster Initiative roll button is in the works-will be a roll template* Random Monster check roll button-this is a gmroll.* Random Monster check distance roll button-this is a gmroll.* Monster Hit AC table## Current Version: 2.7
